headline: 5 Insightful Analyst Questions From Dycom’s Q1 Earnings Call
summary: Dycom’s first quarter results saw strong momentum, with leadership crediting the performance to continued expansion of fiber-to-the-home projects, rapid integration of its recent wireless acquisition, and growth in recurring service and maintenance contracts. CEO Dan Peyovich emphasized that a more diversified customer base, notable project awards with companies like Verizon and Windstream, and robust demand for both fiber and wireless infrastructure supported top-line growth.
